-- breakOnAll :: String -> String -> [(String, String)]
on breakOnAll(pat, src)
    if pat ≠ "" then
        script
            on |λ|(a, _, i, xs)
                if i > 1 then
                    a & {Tuple(intercalate(pat, take(i - 1, xs)), ¬
                        pat & intercalate(pat, drop(i - 1, xs)))}
                else
                    a
                end if
            end |λ|
        end script
        foldl(result, {}, splitOn(pat, src))
    else
        missing value
    end if
end breakOnAll
